pages.text: $(br2)In addition this is $(l)$(4)1$() of $(l)$(4)3$() coal Items which you can use in our Miocore Blaster, where you smelting up to $(l)$(4)238 Items$() per coal item.
This is one of the modded coal items, which we have added in this Mod. $(br2)This coal item smelting up to $(l)$(4)32 Items$() in a normal furnace or blasting furnace.
